entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Drumheller
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
